casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Trustee FOR SG MORTGAGE SECURITIES ASSET BACKED CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-FRE2, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Koki Nilesh KOTAK, fka Koki Boghra; Nilesh Kotak, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Mortgage Electronic Registration Systems, Inc.; Paccon Construction, Inc. ; Central Pacific Bank; Troy Capital, LLC, Defendants-Appellees,
and
John Does 1-10; Jane Does 1-10; Doe Partnerships 1-10; Doe Corporations 1-10; Doe Entities 1-10 and Doe Governmental Units 1-10, Defendants NO. CAAP-16-0000191 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. June 15, 2018

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Vacate. Remand.
